title: UNA defense solid in season opener
content:
FLORENCE — All eyes were on the North Alabama defense in Sunday night’s 34-17 season-opening victory over Miles. 
  
Since the 2014 season ended with Valdosta State piling up 623 yards of offense in a victory over the Lions, the big question for this season has been could the defense improve.
